00041 void BrisaWebService::postRequest(const HttpRequest &request, BrisaWebserverSession *session)
00042 {
00043     onRequest(request, session);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void BrisaWebService::onRequest(const HttpRequest &request, BrisaWebserverSession *session)
00047 {
00048     emit genericRequestReceived(request, session);
00049 }

00053 BrisaWebService::BrisaWebService(QxtAbstractWebSessionManager *sm, QObject *parent) :
00054                 QxtWebServiceDirectory(sm, parent)

00058 void BrisaWebService::pageRequestedEvent(QxtWebRequestEvent *event)
00059 {
00060     this->sessionID = event->sessionID;
00061     this->requestID = event->requestID;
00062 
00063     QByteArray requestContent("");
00064     if (event->content) {
00065          event->content->waitForAllContent();
00066          requestContent = event->content->readAll();
00067     }
00068     emit genericRequestReceived(event->method,
00069                                 event->headers,
00070                                 requestContent,
00071                                 event->sessionID,
00072                                 event->requestID);
00073     emit genericRequestReceived(this, event->headers, requestContent);
00074 
00075     if (event->method == "GET")
00076         postEvent(new QxtWebPageEvent(event->sessionID, event->requestID, DEFAULT_PAGE));
00077 }
00078 
00079 void BrisaWebService::respond(QByteArray response)
00080 {
00081     this->respond(response, this->sessionID, this->requestID);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void BrisaWebService::respond(const QByteArray &response, const int &sessionId, const int &requestId)
00085 {
00086     this->postEvent(new QxtWebPageEvent(sessionId, requestId, response));
00087 }
00088 
00089 void BrisaWebService::respond(const QHttpResponseHeader &response)
00090 {
00091     this->respond(response, this->sessionID, this->requestID);
00092 }
00093 
00094 void BrisaWebService::respond(const QHttpResponseHeader &response, const int &sessionId,
00095                      const int &requestId)
00096 {
00097     QxtWebPageEvent *event = new QxtWebPageEvent(sessionId, requestId, "");
00098 
00099     event->status = response.statusCode();
00100     event->statusMessage = response.reasonPhrase().toAscii();
00101 
00102     // Set key-value pairs from header to event's headers
00103     // it is done because LibQxt's events cannot receive QHttpResponseHeaders
00104     QList<QPair<QString, QString> > headerValues = response.values();
00105     for (QList<QPair<QString, QString> >::iterator i = headerValues.begin();
00106     i != headerValues.end(); ++i) {
00107         event->headers.insertMulti(i->first, i->second);
00108     }
00109 
00110     this->postEvent(event);
00111 }
